short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Looks up words for various languages, Display&Quiz them in new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your language learning experience with this extension! This powerful tool helps you manage your vocabulary, add vocabs automatically from online sources, test your knowledge, and track your progress with ease. Perfect for students, language enthusiasts, and anyone looking to expand their vocabulary.

Key Features: 
Instand Dictionary and Manage Vocabulary:

Add your vocabs to collections to view their stats and you can choose to display them or not - now supports dictionary for 7 languages! Simply enter your word and select the language, this extension will fetch all the data you need(gender, group, inflections*) and put them into tests!
On the rare occasion when you are looking for words with multiple different meanings, you can easily add new words manually.
Bulk import vocabs for back ups
View, edit, and delete your vocabulary entries in the Manage Flashcards page.
Track the number of times you've reviewed each word.
Import and export vocabs
Test your knowledge about a word's definition, pronounciation or gender, or inflections for latin!

Interactive Quizzes:
Test your knowledge with various auto-generated quizzes:
Multiple Choice Definition: Identify the correct definition/gender/pronounciation for a given word.
Multiple Choice Word: Choose the correct word for a given definition.
True or False: Determine whether the given word-definition or word-gender pair is correct.
Auxilary test: Test a word's gender&pronounciation if it is defined, good for languages like german & chinese
Inflection tests: For latin words, you can be tested on a words' inflections!
Each quiz dynamically generates questions based on your vocabulary list.
Track your quiz results and monitor your progress.

Snooze Feature:
Temporarily hide words you're confident with using the snooze feature.
Snoozed words won't appear in vocabs until you un-snooze them.

Progress Tracking:
Each word tracks the last four quiz results, displaying them with intuitive emojis:
üü¢ Correct
üî¥ Incorrect
‚ùî Not yet tested
Easily see which words you need to review more frequently.

Weakspot Testing:
Identify and test words with more than two incorrect quiz results out of the last four  using the specialized test mode.
Focus on improving your weak areas with targeted quizzes.


How to Use:

Dictionary to Vocabulary:
Open the extension and add new words with their definitions. Simply enter the words and select the language, it will retrieve definition, inflection(for latin) and gender data for you. You can then add them in your vocab list.
Manage your vocabulary list in the Manage Flashcards page.
The "Gender" selection of a word is optional, with four options: feminine, masculine,common and neuter. Please let me know by writing me an email if you are learning languages with more genders like Polish, I will send you a version of this extension that has this feature

Take Quizzes:
Click on the "Start Test" button in the Manage Flashcards page to test words that need more practice.
Quizzes are randomly generated to keep your learning dynamic and challenging.

Track Your Progress:
View your quiz results directly on the Manage Flashcards page.
Use the snooze feature to focus on new or challenging words.

Privacy and Security:
All data is stored locally on your device.
No personal information is collected or shared.
